effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, growing a Wild Mushroom at a nearby enemy's location at 100% effectiveness. Casting Celestial Alignment or Incarnation: Chosen of Elune always hits a Jackpot!.
Set: Starfall and Starsurge damage against targets affected by your Wild Mushroom's damage over time effect is increased by 20%.

sockets.display_string: +159 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 398 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 103,381 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 155,079.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 367 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

name: Best-in-Slots

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant you 4,045 to 4,944 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec.
Use: Cheat to immediately gain 4,944 of your highest secondary stat for 15 sec. While out of combat, reconfigure for melee combat instead. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: The wise goblin makes their own luck.

name: Tabard of the Lightbringer

spells.description: Use: Suffuses the wearer with the Light. (30 Min Cooldown)

description: May you always bring light into dark places.
